__e: So you threw away everything we built together, everything we were to each other-- y-you betrayed me for-- for nothing?
I thought I could count on you, but you let me down. Like everyone else.
But it's nothing compared to the day I found out you had turned against me.
You both deserved better, and I'm so sorry I failed you.
Then you got out of prison to find your love had betrayed you.
See, I betrayed you before I even got here.
And I took it from him when I betrayed him and I saw it in his face on the battlefield.
I don't want Daddy thinking I betrayed him.
He said that when he hit a rough patch, you kind of bailed on him... and you never called him again.
Has ditched us for another team at the last minute. - Coper-fucking-sucar. - And we need a replacement.
I don't know if I can accept that she betrayed us.
I know how you used to look at people when they betrayed us... when their stupidity disappointed us.
